name: U.A. Manager
text:
1 Non-Link "U.A." Monster
If this card is Link Summoned, you can add 1 "U.A" Spell/Trap card from your Deck or GY to your hand. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can return 1 "U.A" monster this card points to to the hand and if you do, negate that effect, then Special Summon 1 "U.A" monster with a different name from your hand to a zone this card points to. You can only use this effect of "U.A. Manager" once per turn.
